DOCX Formatting Demo - Combinations, Paragraph Properties, Fonts

This document demonstrates combined inline run properties, paragraph properties affecting layout, and font/size variations, all applied directly in document.xml without styles.xml. Each section shows a header, a styled sample, the corresponding XML, and a CSS mapping or approximation.

Section 1: Combined Inline Styles

Bold + Red + Yellow highlight

Sample Text:

Sample Text

Run XML:

<w:r>
  <w:rPr><w:b/><w:color w:val="FF0000"/><w:highlight w:val="yellow"/></w:rPr>
  <w:t>Sample Text</w:t>
</w:r>

CSS mapping: CSS approx: font-weight: bold; color: #FF0000; background-color: yellow;

Italic + Single underline + Blue underline color

Sample Text:

Sample Text

Run XML:

<w:r>
  <w:rPr><w:i/><w:u w:val="single" w:color="0000FF"/></w:rPr>
  <w:t>Sample Text</w:t>
</w:r>

CSS mapping: CSS approx: font-style: italic; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-color: #0000FF;

Bold + Double underline + Purple underline color

Sample Text:

Sample Text

Run XML:

<w:r>
  <w:rPr><w:b/><w:u w:val="double" w:color="800080"/></w:rPr>
  <w:t>Sample Text</w:t>
</w:r>

CSS mapping: CSS approx: font-weight: bold; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-style: double; text-decoration-color: #800080;

Red text + Yellow highlight + Wavy underline (orange)

Sample Text:

Sample Text

Run XML:

<w:r>
